item.title: Rethink your cloud. Rely on our new arm64 CAX servers

Creating a cloud server has never been so easy and cheap.

Hetzner’s simulataneously launching three new powerful dedicated servers, and all of them at unbeatable prices! The new EX101 Dedicated Server from the EX line houses the high-end Intel® i9-13900 processor and…

item.title: HETZNER CONTINUES ITS GROWTH IN THE US WITH A NEW LOCATION
item.content:encoded:
5. December 2022

West Coast - Here we come: Today, we officially launched our second location in the USA for cloud products in Hillsboro, Oregon, just outside of Portland, a location ripe for…

item.title: RX-Line: Pushing the envelop of parallelization
item.content:encoded:
19. July 2022

The new RX-line is now available and features the first Ampere® Altra® Arm-based dedicated servers in Europe.

item.title: Hetzner Cloud: Flexible Networking
item.content:encoded:
28. June 2022

Three different network options are now available for cloud servers! When you create a cloud server, it will no longer automatically include public IP addresses (IPv4, IPv6).

item.title: 25 years of Hetzner - join the fun & win one of 25 prizes!
item.content:encoded:
1. June 2022

We're celebrating 25 years of being your home for the Internet.

item.title: Focused on a low price and strong performance: the new Hetzner Dedicated Root Server EX43
item.content:encoded:
22. March 2022

The Hetzner Dedicated Root Server EX43 puts the new Intel® Core™ i5-12500 processor in the spotlight. This chip is from the twelfth generation, nicknamed "Alder Lake".

item.title: Seasons special: Skip the setup fee on selected AX servers!
item.content:encoded:
1. March 2022

We want to help you grow this spring. You can now get a Hetzner dedicated root server with an AMD Ryzen™ CPU and skip the setup fees.

item.title: Maximize performance and minimize admin overhead: The new Hetzner managed servers
item.content:encoded:
21. February 2022

Enjoy the powerful performance of two new models and put the responsibility for server administration and maintenance in our hands, letting you relax and focus on your business.
